snippet: The United States bans on currency and gold trade were the first to go into effect since the moderate cleric Hassan Rouhani was elected president last month.
lead_paragraph: The United States bans on currency and gold trade were the first to go into effect since the moderate cleric Hassan Rouhani was elected president last month.

headline.main: New Sanctions Imposed on Iran to Halt Gold Trading
headline.print_headline: New Sanctions Imposed on Iran to Halt Gold Trading
